creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
AIX has odbc_config and odbc_config_64 which means the APU dbd build can't pick up the 64-bit lib.

It would be nice if we could pass the full path to odbc_config which build/dbd.m4 could check as a last resort (currently, you get odbc_config in your path with =yes or $withval/bin/odbc_config if you provide a path).

creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 26890
check if --with-odbc is an executable
